about_the_game:
If you are interested in this game, don't forget to add it to your wish list and join our discussion group.
QQ group: 651050017

Backgrounds

This world once belonged to us, at least that's what we thought. Until that day, everything changed...
Those craters were like the gates to hell. The alien bugs that emerged from them almost destroyed everything we had, leaving only ruins.
Survivors can only struggle to survive, even worse than rats in the sewers.
Everyone was infected with the alien virus, which was hard to prevent. The onset of the disease was only a matter of time.
After the heart-wrenching pain, no matter how strong your spirit was, you would become an irrational "thug".
This was what I still remember after being rescued by the Survivors Alliance.
As for what I did and where I lived before the catastrophe, I had no memory at all.
But that didn't matter. All I know was that I was saved and didn’t become a walking dead.
Although those terrifying bugs were still wandering and building nests out there, the Survivor Alliance finally had a new plan, codenamed - "Rebirth".
As one of the executors, I was sent to a city... God knows what its name was before.
Unfortunately, this clunker broke down right outside the city.
I hope those bugs won't gather quickly. I have to get to the destination as soon as possible.
—Bug Slayer PT021·Notes

Features

  • As one of the special "Bug Slayers", each of your decisions will affect the "Rebirth" Plan to save humanity. Will the final result be as the Survivors Alliance expected? Everything is up to you!


  • Timely receive information from the Survivors Alliance and try your best to rescue the target characters - the "Reborner" who may be trapped anywhere.


  • You must use the collected weapons, food, medicine, and other resources to equip yourself and try to survive as long as possible.


  • The alien bugs from outer space are changeable and difficult to deal with. You must pay attention to all their attributes and the threats they may pose to you.


  • In addition to the alien bugs wandering and building nests everywhere, even those people infected with the alien virus will attack you.

content_descriptors.notes: Only some of the costumes exposed the character's navel. No nudity or adult content, not even underwear.

name: 重生之时试玩版 - Rebirth Moment Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
